specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Advice: Woven > Twill Weave > Denim Denim is designed to fade when washed, so be careful. Separate washing is recommended.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing Do not bleach Tumble dry normal low heat Do not iron Recommended Use Jeans
